lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Long story, but Sam was actually a level 20 hack master known as

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know, Sam always knew that it's available on every platform.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (tearfully) He wanted you all to go to nordvpn.com/criticalrole or use code criticalrole to get a two-year plan plus one additional month with a huge 70% discount.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, Sam waged a digital battle for the freedom of the Nordiverse, until someone sliced him and turned him into a gleaming cube of energy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But where is this spectacular gleaming cube?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's why I thought it was weird.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You ate a slice of BlackWil-- BlackWil-- I can't even say his login handle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Laura, are you-- Are you crying?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not like he was the only man I ever loved.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe I should just unlink my black water capacitor, hard target the maximum risk, cyborg the Time Cop and kickbox the JCVD.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's happening to me? How do I know all of this, and how am I surfing the net with my arms?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: By consuming Sam, you've somehow become leet!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe I'll hack into the Domino's servers and get us all free pizzas.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, what am I supposed to do about it? I'm just a noob.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, like Neo in The Matrix.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your hacker name is Number Two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't want to be The Two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, can't we come up with something else, like CyberCowboy69, or I don't know, The Sentinel, but spelled with all numbers?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you're going to save the mainframe, [upbeat electronic music] you need me to train you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You? What's your trainer code name?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What!? You said I couldn't be The One.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let me guess, the next time NordVPN sponsors our show?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Who does Number Two work for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, NordVPN, for sticking around-- (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the next batch of announcements, Marisha, you have some things to discuss.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Our newest episode of Crit Recap Animated summarizes the Mighty Nein's adventures from campaign two, episode nine through episode 16.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Catch the stream on Tuesday, April 20th at 4:00pm Pacific on Twitch, and look out for the VOD on YouTube Thursday, April 22nd.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And for our final announcement for tonight, Ashley Johnson, if you don't mind.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So head on over to criticalrolefoundation.org to learn more and to donate, right now!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you read The Great Gatsby?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You can also crochet some sleeves on your-- No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Philip K. Dick is my hero.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what would you like to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I'm still hurt from the frost giants.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The rubble is is literally in front of us right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we should probably get all these rocks out of the way or something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was hoping that we would have more time for a rest, but they were on us, and I chose to let you sleep, I'm sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought there might be more time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But if we're going to follow them, we should try and make up ground, yes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, we did just do a heavy number on them as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Last time we tried this idea of running them down, it didn't go well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But what? We call this? What do you mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We sleep and we pick up-- Well, I have an idea. I do have an idea, but we need to sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we have to get through the rubble in order to get there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we're going to have to-- before we sleep, I think we're going to have to get in there, because that might be the place.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are these two on the ground, they're breathing? They're dead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If I recall, before we finished last time, you finished off the remaining members, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is there any-- maybe any reason why we should take one of their heads or anything to talk to them later?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we popped off, well--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Otis'. It's smaller, it'll travel easier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Might not be a bad idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You take one, I'll take the other?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Once we have time to rest, I can put them in the amber, if we prefer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They could bring it back while we're sleeping.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't we need to know where they're going in the city that you flew over?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do think it's smart for you all to get a rest at some point in time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, yeah, I can do nothing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we find them, what can we do, other than yell?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we all just beat each other silly while we're bleeding to death.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think their hurt and our hurt are a world of difference right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But again, if they're on the other side of that rubble, and if they're going into that city and we don't know which house, or which wall, or the secret area, we're going to be lost, unless we have a way of tracking them that I'm not aware of?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we sleep, I'll be able to track them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With sleep, I can track them, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is your plan? Because we can't get through the city now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It might be someone who can help.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We tried to dispel it before, though, didn't we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm pulling rocks, looking for loose rocks that--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as you guys head back into the tunnel, Essek's like, "Well, obviously I was extremely capable of dispelling that thing that was on your chest before."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the point. I was being sarcastic."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay, I just wanted to remind you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as rocks start (rumble) coming out as he's just plucking them as he pulls the gravity from them, aiding you as you guys go along, he's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make a perception or investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to try to dig through and retrieve my unspent Fluffernutter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and make an investigation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm pulling from the top so that we could potentially just move the top layer of rocks and crawl through.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we're not trying to clear the whole fucking tunnel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to say how long it'll take, but if it's all hands on deck, it may be quicker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we're pulling rocks and they've fallen from way above, it's a potential that the entire ground could collapse on us and kill us all, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd like everyone to make an athletics check for me as a group.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was their warning call to let us know that the Tomb Takers were coming."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dagen seemed a little worse for wear, but he was speaking at least."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, there's no choice but to go forward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we get the rest of them down here to help us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Might just be best for them to head back, relay the message.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the second passage, everyone please make one more athletics check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that was the rope you guys had placed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you had taken the rope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Used the rope to lower down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, so the rope would still be there, though a large portion of it is currently--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it is still a taut rope across the way, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your help and with the rope taut, we'll say, for the ease of time, carefully, you make your way across.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel a little shown up by the next generation, I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What would you like to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there dust on the ground? Can we see footprints that they've left? Anything like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make an investigation check, if you'd like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we check for traps or anything? No booby traps?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think they were probably moving.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: An hour ago they were here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have we walked through the threshold into the vast chamber of the city, or?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are at the threshold currently.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll just scan around the threshold, see if there's anything up, or on the sides. Traps.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Giving us a taste of our own medicine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking for traps? Perception or investigation, your call.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see signs of travel, not because there are any footprints necessarily that kept your attention, but because there are some fresh dots of blood.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, can we follow these dots?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Who wants to lead the tracking? This would be survival-based.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mine is too, and I will, if you're all good with it, I will cast Detect Magic as well and try to search.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Their direction to follow along as far as possible, while also, for at least the first 10 minutes, seeing if any kind of glyphs or wards, taste of our own medicine, like you said, is waiting for us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably still be pretty quiet as we move through here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you expand your consciousness to reach for anything arcane around you, what'd you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where are you guys heading within the ward?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You continue along, and you rolled what for survival?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, then you should roll for survival now, or whoever's helming that, I should say.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The blood check, unless-- Wait, Caleb, were you doing it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought that's what the 11 was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Were you both rolling, or were you--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought you were rolling for Detect Magic. I didn't realize--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is no rolling for Detect Magic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled a 19, plus four, plus five.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caduceus, when you took your little trip around, was there a passage in the direction generally that we are headed in?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think I saw any passage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we heading in the direction of the colosseum?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's a little bit of a side path, but it's kind of in the direction you're going currently, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so this will be slower travel, but I would like everyone to make a stealth check, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to give you Blessing of the Trickster.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I get second-hand adrenaline from those rogue rolls, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That 20 may have saved you all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Love that your glasses fogged up right when you did that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I can't-- I just want to drink the tea and I can't.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long has it been, roughly?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Since we started tracking the blood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Since you started tracking it? It's been about, I'd say, at the pace you're going, 15 or so minutes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to throw up Detect Magic again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Total time since we separated is an hour and a half?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the time it took you to take out the rubble.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are the blood splatters still a consistent size or are they diminishing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this moment, they seem consistent and it's enough where you could tell there was a brisk pace being taken.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's also hard to know if it's from a wound or are they using the blood to heal themselves?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to tell with these two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just keep an eye out for any funny business.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are moving forward, unless you'd like to stop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not think that they've stopped or have taken care in guarding their path, from what you can tell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're a few minutes away from-- you can just begin to see at this distance at a bit of the glow, the massive shape of the amphitheater that you had previously arrived at within this ward.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it worth stopping to see if we can get some help?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, how far off the path is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'll take you maybe five minutes to run there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could get to the amphitheater and get back to this exact spot, because you'll be able to find the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Even if we could just get a general direction to where, if we get on the path and we know that that is the direction they're for sure headed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what I'm thinking is if we just go a little, not abandon the amphitheater, but if we follow a little bit further, and maybe can ascertain where, from this massive chamber, wherein they're going.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Time totals on needing to talk to a dead head is instantaneous?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And Dispel, and anything else we would try on the blue globule is instantaneous? Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'd want to talk to somebody in the crowd to make sure that this wasn't a problem.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Also, don't want to let out, like, a super powerful wizard from a thousand years ago, but I'm sure that's not the case.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're probably not all like Halas.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I'll have Caduceus point the way to the amphitheater, so that I know, using Keen Mind, where we are now, where it was, and I can probably do the math later.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can see the dome, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, continuing onward, for about how long do you want to follow?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we reach-- I mean, forever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As long as we get to the end of the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I think we want to know where we're going pretty much, so we'll follow it as long as we can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And if we stumble upon them, we still have numbers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does anybody have any reserves left?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Caduceus has a lot of spells left, I think.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: -- I can just keep some of you--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just if we step on a bear trap, I mean, you know?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As long as it's not me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, let's push forward and see if we can figure out if they're trying to exit out the side of this space or down a hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like you to make another survival check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I assist her, as I am detecting magic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The darting between alleys, between structures, it's not a continuous forward motion, it's tending to curve in a somewhat right-hand direction, which, Caleb, you would know would be more of a southern direction from where you were facing as opposed to going the kind of eastern path that you all were originally heading.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I, because of the feat, know where north is always, so I'm a little GPS.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you do see an opening into the structure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, as I've learned, petrified does not mean what I thought it meant my entire life, as was clarified on Twitter for me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A dictionary that tells you when you're wrong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The plant life does not appear to be alive, and has lost its color, but you are not close enough to fully inspect--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To get any sort of sense of what its current state is beyond the pale coloration of the leaves, and the bark, and other garden elements.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And did you say that the blood, that the trail is leading to this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And the leaves are on the structure?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're in the sinkhole based around it, like it was sitting in this slightly circular garden courtyard, and then it all fell in about 20 feet, and the temple (rumbling crash) fell to the side slightly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we go take a look at the petrified plants or what's inside that temple thing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we take a closer look and see if turned off towards this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They could've wandered off that direction, they could've have gone in the building.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it's just evaporating here, the trail?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know the direction it's going, but at least the blood, which is what you've been primarily following this entire time, has come to a halt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there footsteps heading into the temple?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want to go ahead and make a perception check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you taking a moment to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- to carefully look around, it you want to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to just give you lots of pats and one of them is going to give you Guidance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This does take time, but yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception is a quick glance, investigation is on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like Rick Moranis-ing from Honey I Shrunk the Kids.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I said that I looked as well and rolled a 24 for investigation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Someone goes in the building, someone lights up the hole?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, because if they're camping right inside or something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, either they passed this or perhaps this thing is sunken in, it could be that there is a passage down under this place, yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I was thinking as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because it doesn't cost anything, I'll use Divine Sense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and you are encompassing just the space in the road?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll go right up in between the sinkhole and the building, and just see if there's anything camping out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get a very strong sense of something within the structure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does it specify that you can tell what the source is?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Until the end of next turn, you can sense anything affected by the Hallow spell, and the location of any celestial, fiend, or undead within 60 feet that is not behind total coverage."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can just faintly make out something in there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. There is something, I don't know what, inside the building.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of a celestial, fiend, or undead nature.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there cracks that you could maybe see through on the outside of the building? Like, we could get a little peeksies on the inside without peeking your head in the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to do that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we poking this badger? Okay, we're poking the badger.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we just want to see what it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you climb down through the sinkhole to go up to the building to look in through one of the holes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you all watch as Jester begins to skip down into the sinkhole amongst the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not skipping, I'm being careful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You want a heal or something? Okay, never mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want some help, or are you okay?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cast Detect Magic again and follow her down quietly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Any things we would recognize from words we've already read?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not in particular, no, but you can make a perception check if you want to peer through one crack that has a slight opening in it to see what's inside.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a locker room, they're changing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the exterior, it looks like it sustained some damage, on the inside, it looks like it's even more of a mess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not currently see any movement.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I see any glowies? Anything giving off any kind of light source?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make out the shape of things with your darkvision, but nothing else is catching your attention through this minute crack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It looks like the floor has caved in in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but do you have darkvision?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is anything glowing in there to my eye?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get a very faint magical aura from within a structure of the rubble down deeper in the floor, like just at the edge of that range.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I get a flavor for what school?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just for fun, I'm going to step to the edge of this, where everyone else is, and Eyes of the Grave, 60 feet undead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will know the location of any undead within 60 feet that isn't behind total cover or that isn't protected from divination.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From where you are currently, you don't sense anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you need to roll again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you glance around, you see the same thing that Jester saw, though it's still hard to make out details with almost no light in there whatsoever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But the Detect Undead isn't getting any?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, okay. Mighty Nein check in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we either smartly leave, or we go inside. (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or we play with Plan B.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we have to go through anyway?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Miss "I want to keep playing some more!" at the end of every game.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey man, I'm making up for lost time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know it. I know it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's also believable they've been here before--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They figured out how to navigate this place, so if there's dead things down there, it doesn't mean that they didn't go that way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we send in a scout, a Frump, or an invisible me, or both? Or should we just go in guns blazing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, Frumpkin's not going to be able to see anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, because he can't see in the dark? Can you put the goggles on Frumpkin?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why have we never tried that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there any-- so we're kind of--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're at the end of the road.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're up against the outer wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What keeps going? If continued on this road.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, if we didn't go down the tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The path that you guys were walking, the city path that winds and breaks and is disheveled and uneven in places from the destruction and the impact of the city of Aeor continues on in a southeastern direction through neighborhoods, through structures towards a heavy slate ceiling that descends to clip off the edge of this ward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've got to check it and go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, if it's at the end of the road.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could talk to a severed head.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can do that right now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can do that right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to talk to a severed head while Veth and I get to the end of the tunnel and see what it is and come right back?

lines.name: LAURA

lines.text: "So that is to the individual or to the other people here, if it was an attempt to save, that was quite obviously a failure." As he glides around and gestures to the droves of long dead bodies around you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think she definitely wanted to save herself, maybe others, but I don't think these mages disturbed the gods to the point where they threw them out of the sky.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think these mages created the city.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The other bubbles that we saw people frozen in, were they all mages casting things?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, some of them were running.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you found them at different parts of broken ruins across Eiselcross.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't ultimately know, but my suspicion is that this was a last ditch effort to survive calamity.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I scan around the crowd and just see if everyone is the same sort of body type, like everyone's Aeorian?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But at least in the general presence around you with that roll, that's what you make out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And what was Essek doing? Was he doing some high level dispelling there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This seemed to be his version of the Detect Magic, and trying to ascertain the nature of this particular spell, but it seemed far more complex than a simple Detect Magic could read.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're letting them get farther and farther ahead of us right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're not going to unlock this thing, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But our next step is sleep, isn't it? Or are we going to continue to chase?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've got to sleep at some point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We still don't know where they went, just which road they went down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also, no matter what-- Well, not no matter what, but if we don't stealth very well in chasing them, we're going to have to fight our way through you know an orgy monster.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which I feel like we'll be okay with. I mean, if Cree by herself killed two of them, then probably we can dispatch one without too much effort.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So should we do that first before we sleep?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's hard because I know I need sleep, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I just feel like, you know--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, it feels a little like--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's always worth remembering, though, that they could do that, but at the moment, what could you do to stop it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we know we have a day ahead of us, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Especially if they're continuing to clear the caverns for us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not that I'm a magic user, but even for someone like Cree, it's not a bottomless well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not? I don't know, do we know for sure?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The path might tell us when they decide to rest as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If something happens right now we're going to be real down on our luck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whatever we do, we need to make a decision and actually do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How long have we been awake?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I used all my hit dice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't get a full rest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Matt, I'm assuming we have to start from scratch with that long rest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We were five and a half hours.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because we were, like, six hours in, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would be willing to say if you wanted to complete a long rest for the purposes of this, if you were to garnish an additional three, three and a half hours, you'd finish a long rest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I will nap like a beast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But me and Caleb didn't sleep at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, you guys would need a full.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. So the three of you would need a full night.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't want to run into that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And dead body said it would take a day, day and a half?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's what they took last time, so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So they're going to rest at least once.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They don't have us clearing the path anymore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're also moving while we're standing still and talking about this, so--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it's better that we deal with them on the dregs--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then fight sex monsters, not first in the morning--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then let's go, let's go now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm in that boat as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before we leave, Matt, when you described the stage, it was just the sorcerer on the stage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a number of other figures.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The metallic one is, like, an armored thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gold trim across it, it looks decorative almost.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it have the power gem on it like the one when we got the threshold crest? That one had like a big ruby on it that we took.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, this one it would be within either its head or its chest, are the two areas you would look for that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I took one from the last one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you took a sphere from the center of the last one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go just check it out and see if this one has the same thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like if we could figure out how to wake them up, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see it already has a gem placed in there but it is cracked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hmm, (gasps) put the other one in this one!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, and-- I'm not-- my hands are very good, but do we need some, like, does anyone have any better mechanical knowledge than me? I guess not, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think you're the best. I can assist you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Want to do a quick heart transplant on a dead robot from a thousand years ago? Cool, all right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It could go great or terribly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What sort of skill is this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) So what are you trying to do? You're trying to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there connections? Is it wires? What is this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks just like a half-dome slot that it slips into.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, so it's not, like, arteries or anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be just a dexterity check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh Caleb, just a Death Ward (clicks tongue).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So just add your dexterity modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it does (clicking) and it's there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before all of a sudden (snapping) "(robotic foreign language)"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, you have an hour. You hear,

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, you're going to name it after the thing that died--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry, I thought it was like a password or something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no, let's give it a name, let's say--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about Diddy or Daddy or Deddy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, how quickly can you learn new languages?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do not recall. It appears I have sustained injury to numerous parts of my self." And as he looks down, this genderless creature at the moment seems to pull itself back a bit and you can see its legs are shredded and the cables are leading behind and then just kind of-- "It ap-- It ap-- It ap-- It appears I've sustained some injury."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will die for this creature--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perhaps the Genesis Ward may allow me to reboot and present myself."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where would the Genesis Ward be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ah, that way." And it points loosely in the direction that you were already going to travel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would you like to? May I?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I might become difficult to understand at some point, but if you can just keep guiding us towards where we need to take you to fix yourself, we would be most grateful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I must ask permission from my associates."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a lot of dangerous people around here, just assume if it's not us, it might be a problem.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, stealthy right now, not very--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, as you're saying this, he's starting to stand up, and then (clattering).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can carry him, or you can--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, do we have all of your parts? I know they're not connected to you, but are all of your parts nearby that we can maybe collect?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have only the parts of myself present."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have any offensive or defensive capabilities?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am not engineered to feel pain."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we fix you? Your injuries?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll pick him up and I'll strap you on my back like Chewbacca carried C3PO.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do not understand this reference, but certainly."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Charlie, are you familiar with this entire city?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, do you know it backwards and forwards?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "T-t-t-- I have an internal map (rising and falling tones) ah-- of Aeor." (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So this'll at least be an adventure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it possible for you to talk very quietly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(quietly) I can speak very (louder) quiet-- ch-ch-- ly. (final tone continues)"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you not speak at all?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's get to the Genesis Ward, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Charlie) "Essek." Essek steps back and goes, "I don't trust it." (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essek staying a safe 15 feet behind before brushing up next to you and going, "You do know about Aeor, right?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just be careful of trusting anything at face value."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I haven't done that in a very long time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're going to take a break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Be back here in few minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First off, as you're heading back into the shadow to retrace your steps, I'd like you all to roll a stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will Charlie roll as well? No, Charlie's on Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. But I will roll to see if he stays quiet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's hard to stealth when I've got an Aeormaton on my back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm stealthing for two! Three! Technically.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we're going to fight a gorilla.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where do you go from there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're just going to walk right through? Or should we stealth through?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there a blood trail going from here now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we-- can you do your--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It hasn't ever worked out in our advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, but we're just moving through this space, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have to be within five feet of Fjord in order to not be blinded.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But most of us couldn't see.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, you can if we're all just in a honeycomb.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We literally would have to walk on you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we'd have to be in a little, tight group.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we just keep stealthing and we're okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did they leave another blood trail?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make an investigation check, if you like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You heard something here too, yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, we heard a second-- a third sex monster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, the road continues onward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true, and we know where they're going mostly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I saw it trail this way, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You recall, somewhat, following the path you were traveling, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: From what I found last time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which way was the Somnovem Ward?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just over your shoulder, this conversation?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sprinkle is deeply unsatisfied with this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does that name mean anything to you? Cognouza Ward?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I recall it is a part of Aeor."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So knowing that, do you know what the Cognouza Ward is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Upon recovery and repair, perhaps I could better answer your questions."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Charlie, do you have a preferred pronoun?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Charlie can be a girl's name, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've been saying "he" a lot, that's all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Charlie. Ryan. Those are awesome names.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right as you're reaching this portion, Caduceus, Beauregard, and Caleb, you begin to pick up the sound of what-- it's like a handful of tumbling rocks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn around really quick, and I nudge Caduceus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I tell everybody, shh shh shh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also-- just-- I can see anything-- or if I can hear, I can-- I can sense anything invisible around us with a 10-foot radius.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, let's move with eyes in the back of our head, so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Where does this go? The path?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there passages that extend on the right, or the left?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we see blood on the ground? We see any blood on the ground going either direction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could make a perception or investigation check, if you'd like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing specifically catches your eye, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just see just a little bit, feel around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Charlie, which way to the Genesis Ward? Left or right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This way," and points towards| where the stone wall is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is the right. The left.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it like Labyrinth? Can we touch the wall? Can we go through the wall in front of us? (gasps)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, to the right or the left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like, there's some sort of a heavy crack and an opening that leads, and continues on through the wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A little ways behind you, but you hear another sound.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check with disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scan the horizon for any lifeforms.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think so, is there enough room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And so there is indeed a passageway that leads beyond.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far? Does it just go for awhile? Can we see how deep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which without much of a light source here, is very short.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And if it's something our size, we can be ready for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Watch your step. Watch your step.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While the entryway itself is bent and fucked up in its own right, there is about an eight-foot wide space, from what was once about 15 feet across.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so we have Beau and Yasha up front.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you doing? Stop that!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought this was a musical number.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are the rest of you waiting? Or are you moving in behind?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we're going in behind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have to light it up soon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll come in second with Charlie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I should've gotten a Charlie mini, but we'll say he's on your back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will be in the rear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will join you in the rear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Middle? All right, that's you in that space there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Anyone opposed to me making a globule right here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you opposed to me lighting up my sword?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And eventually, it begins to give away to just a natural, ice covered tunnel space.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I forgot it's actually cold down here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you think that they just kept it nice and temperate all year long?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We light up the globule and the Star Razor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some areas, you have to push a little bit through.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As we move forward, I am looking strictly at our six o'clock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check, please, both of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to look down and see if there's any more blood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or help you in any way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to take advantage on it, if I'm helping you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bad news, with the shift to icier temperatures, in this segment of the hall, is it as much colder than you've gotten used to in recent travel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you can just barely make out the interior shape.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you remember Lucien having anything like that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is the moment to remind everybody that we're a little tapped.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your perception check? Not yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Reminder that we all did eat a Heroes' Feast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or, no. What is it? Advantage to saving throws on-- I'm going to read the spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're immune to poison and fear, and you have advantage on wisdom saving throws.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll check it out. Hang on one second.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You sure you don't want to take Veth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Veth wished for Jester to be with her earlier, so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you die at the end of season two, she's my new partner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the two of you shimmy into the chamber?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you step into the space--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the top and throughout the center of it, there is this faint, blue light that (pulsing).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you sense that, you look at each other, and as that sensation comes in, you can see the hair on the other person's head, mostly Yasha's, since yours is bound for the most part, begin to drift up a bit before dropping.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like those-- I've seen this before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you do that with your fingers, you can see bits of energy arc through your fingers to each side and give a slight staticky sound.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have to keep Veth far away. She's got explosives on her.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, she'll go up like a candle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to be cold again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They both come out looking like Bride of Frankenstein.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Didn't we see this kind of thing? We saw this kind of thing before, right? We saw it in the other place with the crest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Slightly, but it summoned the golem that time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are facets of it that remind you of a similar type of enchantment, though that one--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And even now that they've mentioned this, even in just this portion of the tunnel, a ways back, you can taste a change you can taste a change in the way the air meets your tongue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we in the tunnel still, though, talking about this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're a little bit back from the mouth of the opening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know what that pulsing blue light is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do you get through it, without toasting yourself alive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do not give it to reason to toast you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, so you can just walk right past it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you are approved to pass by, yes."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How do you know if you're approved?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we have pulled something off of one of the corpses in the amphitheater? Like a key, or a charm? Or a fob?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know the approval protocols?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Usually it's by escorting, if you do not already carry the necessary keys."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would you have the authority to get us through this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What was the layout of that room again? As far as further passageways or doors out of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The pillar's in the center of it, and across the way, there is one hall that exits, and then to the left, there is another hall that exits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And cross to cross is about 80 feet? And the spire-- is that right? 80 feet from hallway to hallway?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the spire in the middle is also super tall?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I see any dots of red on the ground going towards one passage or the other?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Investigate. I'm just going to peer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you stand up and look back at your friends, Caleb's hair is just-- (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we don't want to set this thing off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (poofs) Are you able to do that doorway thing that we did at Vergesson?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sorry, what were you saying? I was just caught by your--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to draw him in my journal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your hair and your beard are quite voluptuous.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I was thinking that same thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- your ability to jump us across, but I was hoping to have a good guess at which door to pick.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we would be stuck with whichever one we pick.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Unless maybe Frumpkin wouldn't set off a blast of 20d10 damage from this thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we think if we just walk through there, we're going to get zapped with something?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. We don't have any keys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How far can you go past the orb before it attacks you? If you don't have approval?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't recall, though, it seemed proximity-based."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an arcana check while looking at the construction of it to see.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did we ask him already? Which way to the--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, we asked him outside. We should ask him again.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. Which way do we go?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think he's got another language.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, he is a protocol droid.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got a 28 on that arcana check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A lot of things in Aeor have some sort of basis in long-lasting arcana.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Please pull me out if I do get hurt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take Allura's staff and use it to cast Globe of Invulnerability.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And proceed to walk 15 feet into the chamber.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hitting the orb, and striking the side, and dividing, and sending this wave of sparks across the surface But not affecting you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go to the door on the left.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait. How many of us can fit with you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you all excitedly begin to yell, "Go, go, go!" You hear (panting, grunting) (roaring)

lines.text: That one doesn't hit, strangely. Hits.

lines.text: And the other claw strikes down to catch him with a reversal from over top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Veth, you're up. Caleb, you're on deck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey you, get away from my friend! And I'll shoot him in the face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, why did I roll twice?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I throw them both out, or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, so you miss it and you hurt yourself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Luckily, I only take five points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to fire again, bonus action.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just think of those little door things.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: When you were just a kid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the bigger blades that (vibrating)! All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I spent so much time as a kid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I think I still get sneak attack damage because he's engaged with my friend?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We got to get one of those for Ronin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is he wearing a G-string? Or is that just poetic license?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that is just the pattern of the flesh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it might be a G-string.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I think I've close enough proximity, I'm going to just shove the crossbow in its mouth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it's leaning over Caleb, trying to bite into the Shield, and you jam it up under its throat. (gags)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it just collapses onto the Shield.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you're noticing it basically draped over Caleb, probably going to crush him when that Shield vanishes, you angle it to the side, and it slides and slumps onto the floor next to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Welp, we did it, guys! Let's go down the hall!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, that finishes Veth's turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I hold a black marble out in that direction, and copy my Kryn colleague, and cast Gravity Sinkhole in the far wall behind the eyeball-butt creature.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I will destroy another wall, possibly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think he's saying this way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so, what's the save on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go ahead and roll full damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (impacts) Oh, it doesn't get pulled, it just stays there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make a dexterity saving throw for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, should we have all been rolling d20s for our magic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll do a round of rolls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Rolled real low, but I equipped the Ring of Evasion, so I will choose to succeed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you watch a portion of that gravity well open up to nothing behind you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so roll a d20 for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have a big old note here saying, "Aeor spells, make them roll," and I just keep forgetting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, wait! That's magical butterflies! (laughs) Everything--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nobody else had to roll a d100?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you were the only one that--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Caleb, that's all you're doing on your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast-- How hurt does Fjord look?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look over at Fjord as he's doing this, and as he's shouting over his shoulder for help, he looks hurt, but there's something odd about him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a darkness pouring down his face.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to-- To start with, I'm going to cast--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're turning into the Ring girl!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm actually going to have to move a little bit closer to him to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you would have to get--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will sleep in the kitchen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he's blessed, you're blessed, you said?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm blessed and Veth is blessed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want you to hit things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm going to see if I can get out of the way of the electric thing before it--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've always thought so as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Down into the cubby over there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Down the hall that we just cleared.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With my bonus action, I'm going to cast Hex against this thing in front of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so casting the spell Hex, or using your?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you use your 1st-level paladin slot, because you can. ♪ Multiclassing. ♪ Something's getting in your eyes, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull back, and your palm is filled with hair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At 5th-level, I will cast Armor of Agathys on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now at this level too, as you do this, it isn't just ice particles, but a form of ice armor that encased your shoulders like a mantle of jagged ice shards.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I regain 25 temporary hit points, and I say: Hit me now, bitch. What's wrong with my face?! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finishing Fjord's go, it is now the creature's turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the claw strikes are 14 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The next strike is a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is nine points of slashing damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus (laughs) two points of force damage, rolled terribly for the damage of the crit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So is that doubled up already?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus eight points of force damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it takes 25 and 50 points of ice damage total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Armor of Agathys is no joke if things hit you in melee.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still have temporary hit points up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Temporary hit points are-- I have two temporary hit points.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Man, don't fuck with a warladin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The creature's going to go ahead and move over to this space here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is a bard monk a bank?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to go ahead and cast--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to cast Magic Missile at 5th-level.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I need to roll d20s--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, Hex, you don't have to, because it was a 1st-level.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For when your allergies are real bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For Armor of Agathys, you do. Roll that for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll another d100 for me, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually no, sorry, sorry, you're fine, you're fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They warned you that you'd get hair on your palms.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essek, however, does have to make a roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you see this burst of force energy in the middle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Didn't you have a wand that could do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scanlan had a lot of-- lot of wands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29 points of force damage to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't we have a Wand of Smiles? How come we never use that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a Wand of Smiles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and Essek's going to go ahead and drift off to this side, and try and put more distance between him and the creature, while staying within the radius, as he drifts back and goes, "Caleb, are you all right?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you're up first. Jester, you're on deck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, can I make it to eye-butt monster?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You Super Saiyan teleport, just (zooming) you're there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'm going to slide in like I'm sliding into home base, and then pop-pop, pop-pop!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically that is, yeah, so you'd have advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, fine, great, I'll take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This creature's AC is not crazy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine damage. The one that actually has a writing pencil.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's got to be close to dead, though, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I had good luck on that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look, look, look, stun is the bane of my existence as a DM, so whenever it does go, I'm like, I have to celebrate a little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So that is 13 damage on that next one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's looking a little rough, starting to show some serious wear and tear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, all right, I'm not going to Stunning Strike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not going to Stunning Strike? Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I will Flurry of Blows.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So damage for the first one is going to be 11, and for the second one, 10, so 21 altogether for those.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have any more movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would have 10 feet of movement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I just shift to the side to get out of people's way? So shifting towards-- where am I? My perspective is off, like this wall over--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there something on my face?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a look, it's a look.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it, like, long or is it short hair?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like, it looks like short hair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to run forward and say: I'll save you, Fjord! And I can't get all the up to him, probably.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to chuck my handaxe. (laughs) (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 22 plus four is 26 points of damage to the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to imagine that I threw it just perfectly, that it cleaves off the eyeball tail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see, as it turns and growls at you (snarling) and starts getting slightly more and more tired before it falls unconscious on the path to bleeding out here on the floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As I need both Yasha and Jester to make dexterity saving throws, because you start your next turn within the radius of the tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are just beyond the radius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice, you take nine points of lighting damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it (shushing) these heavy arcs of lightning streak out and hit both of you (shushes) from behind, and you both (grunts) catch your breath for a second, and you see it pulsing and getting ready for another--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't have much time left.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this some sort of ape creature?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just going to go forward and try to get out of the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going towards Caduceus with the staff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go see what's round the other side of this hall.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to make my way to that, ♪ making my way ♪ to that, where Caduceus is. ♪ (weird voice) Caduceus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (weird voice) Hello, my name is Caduceus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two hallways eventually merge, though one is heavily blockaded with rubble that could be climbed through with some challenge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll hop back in the bubble, then, and walk around with everyone else.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, and we got to be brisk, because we're probably out of time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You retrieve your handaxe without issue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I grab the eyeball, and I put it in my bag, as a keepsake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's soft and your foot breaks about an inch or two into it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He looks like he's starting an emo band.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But like, is it-- so is he just fully covered in hair?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's just hair, like, matted to his face from the sweat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you wipe it and it comes free, and you look, and there's a bunch of black hair in your hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just-- I start doing this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you just start hitting it, and as you do, more hair begins to fall out the back of your head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You start seeing patches of hair, parts of skin showing up throughout the scalp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was growing hair-- Oh no, I was just-- (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, wait, hold on, what about my beard and my ball buns?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So at this point, you realize that your beard, as you've been doing this, patches have been scraping off.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's all coming off because you're wiping it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But also, it's all coming off.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's going to come off, but just, maybe it'll stay if you don't touch it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, do we even know-- Do you have a good bald head, or is it misshapen and weird?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we-- I've never seen it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's all or nothing, Yasha, oh dear.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, well, at this point you should just--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to touch his eyebrows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and you rub an eyebrow?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just want to-- yeah, just like a (pop).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It leaves a mark. The hair is gone where you-- (shouting, laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, maybe you should just get rid of all of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've only got one! (screech) there goes the other one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, you're like one of those, those faces with magnets, and like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, you don't need hair, Fjord, don't worry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, maybe it'll wear off, in time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, it'll all wear off, it seems like.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sure we can figure this out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, I'm sure, let's go onward.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should find a place to sleep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any blood-- is there-- what-- the trail that we followed in here, do we see anything on the floor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's all sorts of blood, your own--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I could cut some of my hair, and then we could use the sovereign glue, and put it on your head!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, the sovereign glue will keep it!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It'll keep it on there forever.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So it could be like a salt and pepper thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we keep that as a last resort.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe we should go, this is a bad time--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yasha, may just stand next to him, and put your hair over, so I can picture what it would look like.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll stand above him and put then my hair--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did any of you keep any of them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could you give it to Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can't even see if I'm furrowing my brow!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you know, I could tattoo them on for you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, she can use her paints!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can magically paint some eyebrows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll keep going, we'll keep going.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's going to look like Rip Torn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Every time he changes his expression, you'll have to like go in, and like erase it, and redraw it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Instead of the patchy. All of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eyebrows, beard, hair, you are just a smooth Fjord.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fate of the world and all that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If this is the worst that happens--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think, I think, I think it looks good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't suppose there's anything in this furniture that's just lying here. Is it all just kind of--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When we ran in, did we see what that was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, the piece I'm using is a fireplace, but the present location you're at, it looks like storage chambers that are just left open.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It didn't look like a passageway or like a door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make an investigation check to see if there's anything beyond it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I sure want to walk by the lightning thing again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm already out here. I'll go check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, yeah, and the orb has vanished.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, so you'll just take a shot every time you walk by.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about the one inside the hallway, is that--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make an investigation check on that as well, if you'd like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled 19, 14 plus four, plus one, 19.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, we're just playing with D&D Beyond now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're really good rolls that are coming--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to keep going down the hall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we? I'm a mess, I'm bleeding out my eyes right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this a good place to stop? I mean, we have the hallways in front of us and behind us, and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, is this a good place?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think right in this corner, we make a little dome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, and block the passageway in both directions.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, if we make it in that little corner, then maybe it blocks all three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, all right, I'll pull my book out, and just plop on my butt hard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're setting up around here, you said?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will stand as a svelte sentry as Caleb is-- (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You would've popped up at zero at least, so.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can we see anything down that hall that we haven't gone down? Just to get a little peeksy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From where you're standing, make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you can go in and out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a slight gap beyond it where you can see some shadow.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is a spot with many openings, but we'll be okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Charlie, do you know what's beyond those doors there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I imagine beyond this space is the Genesis Ward."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The question is, do we spend this time long rest-- Ah, nope, nevermind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before we go to sleep, if we get a full rest, I'm actually going to use my last fifth level, and Scry, yeah? I'm going to try to Scry on Cree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! (burbles) Yeah, Guide me, Guide me, before-- help me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So, what is it you're wanting, my dear?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what's going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, let's go have a look, shall we?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look over there, there's a giant eyeball on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, while you haven't seen Artie, just sensing his presence is comforting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I need to roll a natural-- a 20, before I do this spell, or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the spell is a saving throw on their end.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I mean for the wild magic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) No! Oh, I could've lost all my hair, too--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a long table, so there's all sorts of weird shit that can happen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're both in the process of pulling out bandages, and wrapping themselves up to a degree, before Lucien begins sharpening the edge of one of the blades that he carries.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So they're taking a little bit of a beating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know what that means.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And what can I see around them, anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It feels industrious, professional, strangely clean against the surface rubble that you've been wallowing through since your arrival.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And (whoosh), you're pulled out of your Scry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think he knew I was watching.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that's good, they're resting, that means that we can rest as well, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did they look like they were in a place similar to ours?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does he mean us or the whole world?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I tell them everything else that I heard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, we get one more night of sleep, don't we?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Side note, did I-- when she cast Scry, did I see the same thing I saw when I was a giant ape?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we need to do watch, lookouts?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, we're in the dome, we're in the dome, but.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so Fjord and Yasha are taking first watch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: fade into the realm of dream, Beau and Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (loud static noise) And that's where we'll end tonight.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh god-- wait, you guys have two or three?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: See what happens in the morning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we still wise when we sleep?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wonder if they had to go underwater.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If they had to go underwater.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was about to say, we're well built for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) That's true! (laughter) You are swimmer ready.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: An extra five feet of movement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He was a bad looking dude, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, why can't I remember his name? That amazing stunt actor.
